Console IO.write_line: Write a line to the console
Console IO.write_line_with_new_line: Write a line to the console with a return character
Console IO.read_line: Read a line of user input from the console
Console IO.read_char: Read a single char of user input from the console
Console IO.change_console_background_color: Change the color of the console
Console IO.change_console_text_color: Change the color of the console

File IO.list_directory: List of the items in the current directory
File IO.read_directory_info: Get infomation about the current directory (number of items, size, etc)
File IO.move_directory: Move a directory to another locaiton
File IO.update_directory_permissions: Update the permissions a user, group, or application has to a directory
File IO.read_line_of_file: Read a single line from a file
File IO.read_lines_of_file: Read all the lines in a file
File IO.read_file_stream: Read the file into a stream
File IO.move_file: Move a file to a new location

Network IO.add_headers: Add headers to a HTTP request
Network IO.add_query_params: Add query parameters to a HTTP request
Network IO.add_cookies: Add cookies to a HTTP request
Network IO.read_cookies: Read cookies from a HTTP response
Network IO.read_headers: Read headers from a HTTP response

Database IO.execute_query_single_result_set: Execute a query returning a single result set
Database IO.execute_query_multiple_result_sets: Execute a query returning a multiple result sets

JSON.serialize_json_with_options: Serialize an object to JSON with options
JSON.deserialize_json_with_options: Deserialize a string from JSON with options

XML.serialize_xml_with_options: Serialize an object to XML with options
XML.deserialize_xml_with_options: Deserialize a string from XML with options

CSV.read_csv_to_type: Reading a CSV file to a typed array
CSV.append_csv_file: Append to end of CSV file
CSV.set_csv_delimiter: Set the CSV delitmiter to use when reading/writing
